definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This tests if there is 1 or more items in the input slot.</comment><value name="A"><block type="block_inv_get_amount_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This tests if the fuel slot has 1 or more items in the slot.</comment><value name="A"><block type="block_inv_get_amount_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><comment h="72" pinned="false" w="184">This tests if the item in the fuel slot is a fuel item for the block.</comment><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">furnace:fuel</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="procedure_retval_logic"><field name="procedure">SmeltingResultCondition</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This test if the item in the input slot can be type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">TRUE</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This will change the block to the on state.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FurnaceOn</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This should be set to your furnace on block state.</comment></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
